## The Result
Given be a length doubling PRG $\phi: \{0,1\}^n \to \{0,1\}^{2n}$, we obtain a PRG $G_{\phi}$ which achieves an exponential strech. 

## Construction

$$ G_\phi(y) = \phi_{y_1} \circ \dots \circ \phi_{y_t}(x)$$

## Proof of correctness

By a hybrid argumment.
